value.description: Rishi Sunak was in the Covid Inquiry hot seat this week, where he was grilled over his controversial ‘Eat Out to Help Out’ discount hospitality scheme. During the six hours of questioning, Sunak insisted the scheme was the ‘right thing to do,’ while arguing his ‘Dr Death’ nickname was not justified.

value.name: Stormont: DUP officers meet to consider Stormont deal
value.description: A meeting of the Democratic Unionist Party's (DUP) officers took place on Friday as the party considers a potential return to Stormont. The party collapsed the executive 22 months ago in protest against post-Brexit trade arrangements. The DUP has been asking for new legislation to address its concerns.
